fees.description: May be applicable if you choose to pay by Mastercard or Visa credit cards
Charges passed through from your distributor which can vary from time to time
Charges passed through from your distributor which can vary from time to time

electricityContract.terms: This offer applies to customers with an applicable network tariff. For full terms & conditions and solar feed in tariff eligibility, visit our website www.diamondenergy.com.au.

discounts.description: Ongoing 2% discount on GST exclusive daily supply charges and usage rates with email invoicing and full payment received by due date

electricityContract.variation: We may vary the Charges (including the amount and structure of any Charges), discounts, solar feed-in rates and Terms & Conditions from time to time consistent with the Terms & Conditions.

greenPowerCharges.description: For 2.75 c / kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 50% of your consumption will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators
For 5.5c / kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 100% of your consumption will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators

solarFeedInTariff.description: Diamond Energy Standard Feed-in Rate, subject to eligibility. Amounts are GST exclusive (if any)

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: This is an ongoing agreement with ongoing benefits and continues until you or we end it.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Other fees may apply including for such items meter special reads, meter installation, reconfiguration, energisation and de-energisation. Contact Diamond Energy for further information.
